DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect ice shortwave diathermy different region low limb neuromuscular response balance .
DOC.brief_title: Analysis Neuromuscular Responses Balance After Application Physiotherapy Resources
DOC.detailed_description: Applying ice shortwave diathermy perform separately ( different day ) foot , ankle calf . To assess neuromuscular response evaluate electromyographic activity rectus femorals , biceps femorals , gastrocnemius tibialis anterior . To assess effect application balance , force platform evaluate oscillation center pressure well ground reaction force .
DOC.criteria: woman healthy young sedentary sensory change history fracture low limbs menstrual period diabetes Mellitus Bone , muscle and/or neural disease
